name: ICE Cube Frozen Pilot
description:
Its time to beat the summer heat with colorful juicy flavored drink. Juicy and frozen snow cones are best way to treat with heat.


Now, you want to know what are the best snow cone flavors? Select any flavor you like from Watermelon, Cola, Strawberry, Lemonade, Orange and Lime, then decorate with some delicious candy & material.
